history.proof: intros n m Hn Hm Hle. destruct (Z.le_ge_cases n m) as [Hnm | Hnm]. - srun best use: Z.square_le_simpl_nonneg. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: le_lt_trans, Z.

ctx: intros n m Hn Hm Hle.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m : Z Hn : 0 <= n Hm : 0 <= m Hle : m * m <= n * n Hnm : n <= m Unable to unify "n <= m" with "m <= n".

ctx: intros n m Hn Hm Hle.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: intros n m Hn Hm Hle.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m : Z Hn : 0 <= n Hm : 0 <= m Hle : m * m <= n * n Hnm : m <= n Unable to unify "(?M1846 ?= ?M1847) = Gt -> False" with "(m ?= n) = Lt".

ctx: intros n m Hn Hm Hle.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m : Z Hn : 0 <= n Hm : 0 <= m Hle : m * m <= n * n Hnm : m <= n Unable to unify "(?M1843 ?= ?M1845) = Lt" with "(m ?= n) = Gt -> False".

ctx: intros n m Hn Hm Hle.
exceptions.exn: In environment n, m : Z Hn : 0 <= n Hm : 0 <= m Hle : m * m <= n * n Hnm : m <= n Unable to unify "(?M1843 ?= ?M1844) = Lt" with "(m ?= n) = Gt -> False".

original: intros n m Hn Hm Hle. destruct (Z.le_ge_cases n m) as [Hnm | Hnm]. - apply Hnm. - apply Z.lt_le_incl, Z.square_le_simpl_nonneg; auto. apply Z.le_lt_trans with (n * n); auto. apply Z.square_lt_simpl_nonneg; auto.
